:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Puma - 802.11ac 4x4 Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless_RT4230W.html}} {{•}} [http://www.askey.com.tw/pdf/RT4230W.pdf Datasheet] "RT4230W-D187(RoHS)A Rev:9" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/H8NRAC2V1K/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3305962 FCC photos]. :Branded for Charter (Spectrum) internet. ===See also=== *[[Askey RT4230W]] • ''Puma'' - 802.11ac 4x4 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless_RT4230W.html PPage] *[[Askey RT4220W]] • ''Cube Router'' - 802.11ac 2x2 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless10.html PPage]
